Articles.Content:
I will be making a mod about the science of space.

It will have science-based parts that do things like measure radiation and get info about the inner workings of planets.

It's going to be a long-term project, and I haven't made any mods yet, but I will somehow manage to do it.

Reply with feedback about the idea.

It will be under the GNU Lesser General Public License, because I think it suits the mods characteristics. It won't be proprietary, you can feel free to change the mod to your liking, BUT!, only for personal purposes!

EDIT #1: The mod is in experimentals for it's seventh day. Don't worry, it'll be out soon, I KNOW IT . so the version number is right now 0.1.16776447 x7.

Edited October 17, 2014 by FirstSecondThird

I will be making a mod about the science of space.

It will have science-based parts that do things like measure radiation and get info about the inner workings of planets.

It's going to be a long-term project, and I haven't made any mods yet, but I will somehow manage to do it.

Reply with feedback about the idea.

It will be under the GNU Lesser General Public License, because I think it suits the mods characteristics. It won't be proprietary, you can feel free to change the mod to your liking, BUT!, only for personal purposes!

EDIT #1: The mod is in experimentals for it's seventh day. Don't worry, it'll be out soon, I KNOW IT . so the version number is right now 0.1.16776447 x7.

I'm interested. But try not to copy DMagic's stuff, which is popular. I mean, use OTHER experiments, then those that are already in DMagic pack

I'm not sure anyone cares, but:

>It will be under the GNU Lesser General Public License, because I think it suits the mods characteristics. It won't be proprietary, you can feel free to change the mod to your liking, BUT!, only for personal purposes!

..is a contradiction afaik..

you can't prohibit any kind of usage with LGPL - anyone may even relabel and sell an LGPL mod..

correct me if I'm wrong..

If you use GPL instead of LGPL, it will stay GPL..

..but who cares about a license for an empty forum post with no download hahha

my twisted sense of humor..
I want science about distant black holes!
